display_long_description:
Title: FlyVRX - Military Gunship Helicopter War
Genres: Action, Flying, Simulation

A realistic Military Action Arcade style Helicopter Simulation that puts in direct thrilling combat action. Play either as a pilot with professional Helicopter control with your hand controllers or choose to be in the gunner seat with Heli in auto flying mode.

Fly over enemy military camps and hideouts in realistic mountainous and desert terrains. Hover over enemy captured oil rig in deep sea and gun down the enemy commandos in your gunner mode.

Features:
- Easy and smooth grab controls & navigation.
- Realistic Graphics and Environments
- Sea Oil Rig, Mountain and Desert Terrains
- Missions, Survival, and Dog-Fight Mode
- Cockpit Pilot and Gunner mode
- Machine-gun and Missile fire
- Multiplayer Team mode (Gunner + Pilot) with voice (coming soon)

How to Play:
1. Pilot Mode:
- Right Controller Hand: Grab/Hold Stick for Heli Movement/turn
- Left Controller Hand: Grab/Hold side lever for Heli Altitude control
- Right Controller Thumb joystick: For Aim crosshair movement
- Right Controller Trigger: Bullet Machine Gun Fire
- Right Controller “A” Button: Missile Fire

2. Gunner Mode:
- Grab/Hold using either Left/Right controller hand Machine-gun handle
- Right Controller Trigger: Fire Bullets
